ComicInfo.Summary:
The Origin of the Hulk: A recap of how Bruce Banner and then Amadeus Cho each became the Hulk.
Return to Planet Hulk Part 1: Amadeus picks up a distress call from Sakaar and follows it through a portal to the planet. The Clan Doka'abii who summoned him believe him to be the Banner Hulk and ask him to be their champion against the Warlord, who will enslave the clan if their champion loses the Gauntlet. The Hulk begins to fight the first round of the Gauntlet.
ComicInfo.Title: The Origin of the Hulk; Return to Planet Hulk Part 1
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Frank D'Armata,Greg Land,Jack Kirby,Jay Leisten,Joe Sinnott,Marcelo Maiolo,Mike Deodato Jr.,Mike McKone
